muhc.configuration.title: MaidUseHandCrank Configs
muhc.configuration.priority.tooltip:
The priority of hand crank tasks
The task needs to be reset to take effect
muhc.configuration.searchRadius.tooltip:
The search distance of the hand crank
The task needs to be reset to take effect
muhc.configuration.reachRadius.tooltip:
Interaction with the hand crank will only start when the distance is less than this
The task needs to be reset to take effect
muhc.configuration.bubbleInterval.toolti: How often to say something while cranking
task.muhc.hand_crank_task.desc: The maid will use a nearby hand crank
message.muhc.working.3: Only work can make me complete
message.muhc.working.4: Grateful for the tasks master assigns me
message.muhc.working.5: Work is the meaning of my existence
message.muhc.toxic_positivity.2: Tomorrow you will thank today's struggling self
message.muhc.toxic_positivity.3: Pain is temporary, glory is eternal
